name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AliExpress: Exchange rate US Dollar today

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension will help you find the current exchange rate of the U.S. dollar against world currencies on AliExpress.
